Linking Sublime as IDE

I just configured up Sublime Text 3 build 3083 with sublime-jekyll a Sublime Text package for Jekyll static sites. This provides the quick functionality to create new blog post. I will explain later how I put up the whole site together and thoughts about it. I added MarkdownEditing on the top to get a better feel for the markdown, I am still testin it out.

Time to push this post out.
